headline: Eversource Energy (ES): Valuation in Focus After Q3 Turnaround and Reaffirmed 2025 Guidance
summary: Eversource Energy (ES) delivered a clear shift in Q3 2025 by reversing last year’s net loss into strong net income, with both sales and earnings climbing. Investors are taking note of reaffirmed 2025 guidance and continued operational focus. See our latest analysis for Eversource Energy. Eversource Energy’s stock has bounced back with real momentum this year, most recently supported by its reversal to profit and reaffirmed guidance. The company is navigating wind-down costs from offshore wind...
